sourceMeaningMnemonic: You see an <radical>animal</radical> with some <radical>flowers</radical> and a <radical>turkey</radical> on a <radical>stool</radical> trying to <kanji>seize</kanji> them. The animal with the flowers is really tall so the turkey needs to stand on the stool in its attempt to seize the flowers.
meaningInfo: Look at this turkey straining itself on the stool trying to seize the flowers, grunting with effort. You think he’ll ever get them?
readingMnemonic: The animal the turkey is trying to <kanji>seize</kanji> the flowers from is a <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>). The cock is a lot bigger than the turkey, so that’s why the turkey needs to stand on the stool in its attempt to seize those flowers.
readingInfo: Imagine this scene again only with a big cock holding the flowers as the turkey attempts to seize them. Hear the cock shouting cock-a-doodle-doo as it defends its flowers.
